titleInfo.title: Ext 4599/45 'Persia - Payments to Church Missionary Society, Kerman (medical work)'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between the Foreign Office and the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf regarding the continuation and increase of monthly payments to the Church Missionary Society, Kerman during and after the Second World War.
